SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.diylc.core.annotations
Annotation Type ComponentDescriptor

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ComponentDescriptor

Annotation for IDIYComponent implementation. Describes component properties.

Author:
Branislav Stojkovic

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String author
           
 java.lang.String category
           
 java.lang.String description
           
 java.lang.String instanceNamePrefix
           
 java.lang.String name
           
 double zOrder
           
 
Optional Element Summary
 boolean autoEdit
           
 BomPolicy bomPolicy
           
 CreationMethod creationMethod
           
 boolean flexibleZOrder
           
 boolean rotatable
           
 boolean stretchable
           
 

Element Detail

name

public abstract java.lang.String name
Returns:
component type name.

description

public abstract java.lang.String description
Returns:
component type description.

category

public abstract java.lang.String category
Returns:
component category, e.g. "Passive", "Semiconductors", etc.

author

public abstract java.lang.String author
Returns:
component author name.

instanceNamePrefix

public abstract java.lang.String instanceNamePrefix
Returns:
prefix that will be used to generate component instance names, e.g. "R" for resistors or "Q" for transistors.

zOrder

public abstract double zOrder
Returns:
Z-order of the component.

creationMethod

public abstract CreationMethod creationMethod
Returns:
method that should be used to create a component. If CreationMethod.POINT_BY_POINT is used, user will have to select ending points before the component is created.
Default:
org.diylc.core.CreationMethod.SINGLE_CLICK

flexibleZOrder

public abstract boolean flexibleZOrder
Returns:
true if the component may go beyond it's predefined layer. In that case, zOrder is used as initial z order of the component.
Default:
false

stretchable

public abstract boolean stretchable
Returns:
when false, moving one control point will cause all the others to move together with it.
Default:
true

bomPolicy

public abstract BomPolicy bomPolicy
Returns:
controls what should be shown the BOM
Default:
org.diylc.core.annotations.BomPolicy.SHOW_ALL_NAMES

autoEdit

public abstract boolean autoEdit
Returns:
when true, component editor dialog should be shown in Auto-Edit mode.
Default:
true

rotatable

public abstract boolean rotatable
Returns:
true if component may be rotated, false otherwise
Default:
true
